title: Please Identify Hospital's typeface
content:
Hello, I've been trying to identify this typeface used for this hospital. Any help would be greatly appreciated!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen shot 2013-03-24 at 1.38.56 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130515223416/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202013-03-24%20at%201.38.56%20PM.png) | 20.24 KB |
| [Screen shot 2013-03-24 at 2.00.49 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130515223416/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202013-03-24%20at%202.00.49%20PM.png) | 21.88 KB |
author: DomSebastian

comments.content: Wow! Thank you for the quick response, Josev.

I think it could be also an Arial Rounded, while the second one could be Arial Black.

[http://www.fontpalace.com/font-details/Arial+Rounded+MT+Bold/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130515223416/http:/www.fontpalace.com/font-details/Arial+Rounded+MT+Bold/ "http://www.fontpalace.com/font-details/Arial+Rounded+MT+Bold/")  
 [http://www.fontpalace.com/font-download/TR+Arial+Black/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130515223416/http:/www.fontpalace.com/font-download/TR+Arial+Black/ "http://www.fontpalace.com/font-download/TR+Arial+Black/")

_I think it could be also an Arial Rounded, while the second one could be Arial Black._

Wrong IDs and illegal download links
I'm sorry, I didn't mean to provide download links, merely a pic of the font.

Hospitals are institutions in which illnesses, injuries, and disabilities are diagnosed and treated. Deploying advanced medical technology, modern American hospitals are capable of providing medical services beyond those available in physicians' offices or outpatient facilities. [Dr. Lauren: Neck Pain Relief in Baltimore](http://web.archive.org/web/20130515223416/http:/www.livingwellness.net/)

The man is in intensive care, hospital officials said. Doctors said the man can't make decisions for himself or explain who he is or give names of relatives.Hospital inpatient facilities associated with and those not associated with a hospitals. [Dr. Rusick: Neck Pain Relief in Goodyear](http://web.archive.org/web/20130515223416/http:/www.healthiergoodyear.com/)
Hey, Typophile admins, looks like we have a troll here.
